source: TEXT_BANAMA210_01241_SEQ_00<tab>Narujj Boh is exhausted by his stubborn kin's single-mindedness.
target: TEXT_BANAMA210_01241_SEQ_00<tab>灰の陣営のナルジ・ボーは、冒険者の力を見せてほしいようだ。

source: TEXT_BANAMA210_01241_SEQ_01<tab>Narujj Boh tiredly explains that the Amalj'aa in Zanr'ak have constructed yet more of their ominous flame-topped towers. Find the infernal beacons and destroy them.
target: TEXT_BANAMA210_01241_SEQ_01<tab>ナルジ・ボーの依頼を受けた。ザンラク周辺にある「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2075501 /var>」を2基破壊しよう。

source: TEXT_BANAMA210_01241_SEQ_02<tab>You have destroyed the infernal beacons. Return to the Ring of Ash and report to Narujj Boh.
target: TEXT_BANAMA210_01241_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2075501 /var>を破壊した。灰の陣営の「ナルジ・ボー」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_BANAMA210_01241_SEQ_03<tab>Narujj Boh deduces from the stink of ruin that you were successful in your task. He exults in the defeat of his enemies' plans, and thanks you for your contributions to the Brotherhood's cause.
target: TEXT_BANAMA210_01241_SEQ_03<tab>ナルジ・ボーに報告した。依頼通り、<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2075501 /var>を破壊した冒険者に感嘆するナルジ・ボー。冒険者を味方にできたことを、幸いなことだと考えているようだ。またの機会に協力しよう。

source: TEXT_BANAMA210_01241_NARUJIBOH_000_000<tab>Our fanatic kin are nothing if not persistent. Once more they seek to focus and intensify the blessings of their deity.
target:
TEXT_BANAMA210_01241_NARUJIBOH_000_000唖然失笑……焔神にすがる者どもは、まこと諦めが悪い。
奴らめ、いまだに「聖火」を用いて、
焔神の加護を増さんと、企んでおると見える。

source: TEXT_BANAMA210_01241_NARUJIBOH_000_001<tab>They have constructed sturdy beacons in Zanr'ak, and consecrated these towering talismans with Ifrit's fire.
target:
TEXT_BANAMA210_01241_NARUJIBOH_000_001奴らはザンラク周辺に「聖火」を灯した聖火台を建て、
まじないの術式を組もうと画策しておるらしい。

source: TEXT_BANAMA210_01241_NARUJIBOH_000_002<tab>You will need more than a handful of ash to smother such roaring flames, honored ally. The time for subtlety has passed! Use whatever weapons you have at your disposal, but bring these structures crashing down!
target:
TEXT_BANAMA210_01241_NARUJIBOH_000_002強き者よ……その力、存分に見せて頂きたい。
邪なる炎を奉じる「」を破壊すべし！

source: TEXT_BANAMA210_01241_NARUJIBOH_000_004<tab>As ever, the Flamefangs will seek to deny you at every turn. Engage them if you must, but do not lose sight of your true task.
target:
TEXT_BANAMA210_01241_NARUJIBOH_000_004されど、聖火台は「炎牙衆」どもが守っておる。
重々気をつけるがいい。

source: TEXT_BANAMA210_01241_NARUJIBOH_000_010<tab>Find the infernal beacons in Zanr'ak, and leave of them nothing but smoking ruin!
target:
TEXT_BANAMA210_01241_NARUJIBOH_000_010敵地、ザンラク周辺にある
「」を破壊すべし！

source: TEXT_BANAMA210_01241_NARUJIBOH_000_020<tab>I judge by the smell of smoke and blood that your task was a success. Even my stubborn kin must now feel a flicker of doubt in the strength their vaunted blessings bestow upon them.
target:
TEXT_BANAMA210_01241_NARUJIBOH_000_020あの厄介な聖火台を、見事に打ち崩してきたようだな！
見事だ……まさしく快挙だ、強き者よ！

source: TEXT_BANAMA210_01241_NARUJIBOH_000_021<tab>You, an outsider, have accomplished much for the Brotherhood. We are fortunate indeed to have you as our honored ally.
target:
TEXT_BANAMA210_01241_NARUJIBOH_000_021やはり一流……尊敬に値する。
「灰の一党」がお主のような知己を得られたこと、
何よりも僥倖だと思わねばなるまい。
